inclusion.criterion: Males (20-60 years old ) and premenopausal females
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Alcohol consumption of ≥30 g/day in men
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with suspected or proven any other liver disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Postmenopausal females to avoid the increased risk of osteoporosis in those patients due to hormonal changes.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with conditions known to affect bone metabolism, such as kidney, thyroid or parathyroid diseases.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 53-year-old man complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is getting worse. Examination shows bilateral swellings around the molars.
